TopicTitle: Can't target Duna, Sun or Kerbin

Articles.Content:
I've taken advantage of a launch window to send six probes to Duna and Ike. I have each of them set up for a course correction to bring it close to its target, except one. It's supposed to orbit Ike, but I can't get a correction for a good encounter because I can't select Duna as a target. I also can't select Kerbin or the sun as a target. The usual menu doesn't appear at all.

Steam version, so should be up to date. [URL="https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B6PtvJMCC05yTlRyNVphRUV5d1U&usp=sharing"]Here is[/URL] a simplified save with only one flight, the one affected, which reproduces the issue in an unmodded install. Edited November 21, 2015 by Thrawcheld
Turns out this issue [URL="http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/777"]is known already[/URL].
Should you be able to target the sun in KSP? I thought they removed that.
